attributes.action: Get Katie Hopkins Out Celebrity Big Brother
attributes.additional_details: Katie Hopkins is in celebrity big brother on channel 5 as she entered the big brother house the mirror started to talk, Katie Hopkins said is that a Scottish accent and said I hate people who are fat and unemployed , after the controversy of her actions by making fun and comments of the Glasgow incident which 6died and 10 were injured I do not agree that Katie should be in this show as the public will agree she has already misspoken about the Scottish when entering the big brother house and this is not acceptable so sign the petition and get her out for the sake of the public and the family of the Glasgow incident.
